      • addSong

                                java.lang.String artist,
                                java.lang.String date,
                                java.lang.String songGenre,
                                int duration)
        addSong: It creates a song and add it to the pool array
        pre pool array must be initialized, title, artist and date cant be null or empty strings, the duration must be a positive integer
        pos The pool array is going to be filled in one box if it is not full already
        Parameters:
        title - Is the song title
        artist - Is the name of the artist or grupo that produced the song
        date - Is the release date of the song
        songGenre - Is the gender of the song which is already in the necesary format
        duration - Is the duration of the song
        Returns:
        message Is a message that informs the user about the state of the procedure
